name: You Have 10 Seconds 2
description: You Have 10 Seconds 2 is the sequel to the popular Free to Play game "You Have 10 Seconds". You have 10 seconds to get from the start of each level to the end before time runs out and without dying.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows 8 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB Storage: 140 MB available space
